dt-example.title: Basic initialisation
dt-example.info:
KeyTable allows you to use keyboard navigation on a DataTables enhanced table, like an Excel spreadsheet. The focused cell is shown through the CSS class (`-string focus` - configurable using `kt-init keys.className`) which in the case below is simply a blue outline. Use your keyboard's arrow keys and click the cells in the table to navigate.
By default KeyTable will not automatically focus on a table cell when the table is loaded, but rather it acts like a normal form element. It will receive focus when clicked on or when tabbing through the document's form elements.
